Articles.Content:
During my time messing around in KSP lately, I've had a few thoughts.

In the Tracking Station, I think it would be really helpful to have the capability to sort ships by SOI and perhaps even by target SOI in addition to alphabetic and launch dates. The ability to search for a specific ship would be useful as well.

A search function in the VAB and SPH load ship screens would be really nice as well.

Thanks, mattssheep4
